item.description:
The reservation is for 12 noon and will be in the name of
Mindy Meetup group.
Please be considerate of other members and RSVP "YES" only if you are able attend. If the brunch fills up, but you'd like to attend, please RSVP "NO" and say "add me if there's an opening". Thanks!!

I've posted a photo of the outside of the restaurant. It's on the corner of Congress and "A" Street.

Operating on the "down low" (there's no sign out front), this Seaport District lunchtime "find" , "after-work rendezvous" , "retro" , "supper club" , "late-night" "speakeasy" and all around "homage to Sinatra" couples American comfort food and "good drinks" with "cool tunes" for a "hot crowd".

--Zagat

http://www.luckysloun...


Rules of the B, B, L and D Meetup group

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly for events.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your expenses, which are mainly meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If an organizer changes your RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update event confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW it will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, without an explanation, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must contact the organizer directly by calling or texting.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so, please rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.
Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: I have dark, curly hair and I'll be wearing a GLOW STICK necklace. Check out my photo on the Meetup site. I'll be at the bar area before noon.
item.why: Come listen to LIVE SINATRA music and enjoy good food among friends!

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: LUCKY'S LOUNGE SINATRA SUNDAY BRUNCH
